import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import Table from 'react-bootstrap/Table' import {Col, Row, Container} from 'react-bootstrap' import Card from '../UI/Card' import classes from '../CSS/Contests.module.css' // Actions import {getContests} from '../REDUX_STORE/ACTIONS/ContestAction' class Contests extends React.Component { componentDidMount = () => { this.props.dispatch(getContests()) } render (){ console.log("CONTEST PROPS", this.props.contests.contests) return ( {(this.props.contests.contests.length > 0) && this.props.contests.contests.map((contest, index) => )}
# Title Game ID Winners Status Actions
{index} {contest.title.toUpperCase()} {contest.contest_unique_id} @mdo Otto Otto
) } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return {contests: state.contests} } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Contests);
